sense.name: The act of creating written works.
sense.examples: Writing was a form of therapy for him. She did the thinking while he did the writing. Her writing in this novel is excellent.

sense.name: The work of a writer.
sense.examples: That editorial was a fine piece of writing. Her writings are stored in London. The idea occurs in Heminway's writing as well.

sense.name: Letters or symbols that are written or imprinted to represent the sounds or words of a language.
sense.examples: The doctor's writing was almost illegible. He turned the paper over so the writing wouldn't show.
